name: Harvey's Lake Tahoe
description: Harvey's Lake Tahoe is a premier Stateline casino resort with outdoor heated pool and direct access to Edgewood Tahoe Golf Course. Connected to Harrah's.
shortDescription: Premier Stateline casino with outdoor pool and Edgewood Tahoe golf access.

roomTypes.name: Deluxe Room
roomTypes.description: Comfortable rooms with contemporary mountain-lodge decor, premium bedding, flat-screen TV, and views of Lake Tahoe or the mountains.

roomTypes.name: Resort Tower Room
roomTypes.description: Upgraded rooms in the Resort Tower with modern finishes, enhanced amenities, and stunning lake views.

roomTypes.name: Lake Tower Suite
roomTypes.description: Spacious suite with separate living area, wet bar, and panoramic Lake Tahoe views.

faqs.question: Does Harvey's have an outdoor concert venue?
faqs.answer: Yes — the Harvey's Outdoor Arena hosts major touring acts throughout the summer season, with capacity for thousands of concertgoers right on the lake.

faqs.question: What dining is available at Harvey's?
faqs.answer: Multiple options including Sage Room Steak House, Café Tahoe, Hard Rock Café, and several casual dining and bar options.

faqs.question: Is Harvey's a good base for skiing?
faqs.answer: Excellent — Heavenly Village and the gondola are within walking distance. The resort also offers ski valet and storage services during winter.

meta.title: Harvey's Lake Tahoe | Casino Resort & Golf Packages
meta.description: Harvey's Lake Tahoe with outdoor pool, mountain views, and golf packages near Edgewood.

testimonials.quote: Harvey's Lake Tahoe exceeded our expectations. The staff was incredibly accommodating with our group of 24 — early breakfast, late checkout, bag storage. Everything GTHS promised about this property was accurate.
testimonials.author: Carlos N.

testimonials.quote: Harvey's Lake Tahoe is an ideal spot for a golf getaway in Lake Tahoe. Close to great courses, good restaurants on-site or nearby, and the rooms have everything you need. GTHS knows exactly which room blocks to reserve for groups.
testimonials.author: Laura D.

testimonials.quote: Third year in a row staying at Harvey's Lake Tahoe for our corporate golf outing. Consistency is what matters for group travel and this property delivers every time. Having GTHS handle reservations saves us hours of coordination.
testimonials.author: Bill M.
